code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useFont}from'./context/ZoomContext';import'./Zoom.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Zoom=()=>{const{tamanhofonte,aumentafonte,diminuifonte}=useFont();const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"zoom-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Determine o tamanho da fonte"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{fontSize:"".concat(tamanhofonte,"px")},children:"Parece bom?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tam-buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:diminuifonte,className:"tam-button",children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:aumentafonte,className:"tam-button",children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ok-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/configuracoes'),className:"ok-button",children:"Est\xE1 bom!"})})]});};export default Zoom;
